divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS DRIVING DOWN PRIOR STATION RD IN CEDARTOWN GEORGIA CLOSE TO THE ALABAMASTATE LINE.WHICH IS OUT IN THE COUNTRY.MY BROTHER AND MY BEST FRIEND WERE WITHME.IT WAS ABOUT ELEVEN O CLOCK AT NIGHT.WE SAW A REALLY BRIGHT LIGHT UP AHEAD INTHE ROAD WE WERE ALL SAYING WHAT IS THAT.WE THOUGHT THE WOODS WERE ON FIRE.MYFRIEND JERRY SAID LETS TURN ARROUND AND CALL THE FIRE DEPARTMENT.I SAID WE NEEDTO MAKE SURE ITS A FIRE BEFORE WE CALL THEM SO I KEPT DRIVING CLOSER TO SEE WHATIT WAS.AS WE APROACHED ALL WE COULD TELL IS THAT IT WAS A REALLY BRIGHT LIGHT.ISLAMMED ON THE BRAKES BECAUSE I COULDNT SEE THROUGH THE LIGHT IT WAS SO BRIGHT ICOULDNT EVEN SEE THE TREES ON THE SIDE OF THE ROAD.JERRY AND JASON WERE BOTHYELLING DONT STOP DONT STOP I YELLED WELL IM NOT GOING THROUGH IT.WE WERE ALLYELLING WHAT IS IT WHAT IS IT.THE LIGHT WENT DIM AND WE LOOKED UP AND STARTEDSCREAMING ITS A UFO ITS A UFO.WE COULD SEE THE BOTTOM AND ONE SIDE OF THE OBJECTIT WAS ABOUT THIRTY FEET ABOVE US. AS THE LIGHTS WENT DIM I COULD SEE THAT THESOURCE OF THE BRIGHT LIGHT WAS COMING FROM THESE ROUND RED,WHITE,AND BLUE LIGHTSON THE SIDES OF THE OBJECT THAT WENT ALL THE WAY ARROUND IT.THE BOTTOM OF IT WASSEGMENTED INTO ABOUT TEN SECTIONS LIKE PIE PEICES EXCEPT THE CIRCLE IN THEMIDDLE.IT WAS ARROUND FOURTY TO FIFTY FEET ACROSS.IT HOVERED FOR ABOUT TENSECONDS ABOVE US THEN IT JUST DISAPEARED.IT TOOK ABOUT THREE SECOND BEFORE ARAINBOW APEARED WE LOOKED BEHIND US TO SEE WHERE IT LED.THERE WAS A RAINBOWTRAIL BEHIND US I GUESS IT WAS THE TRAIL IT LEFT.THE RAINBOW ZIG ZAGED DOWN THEROAD BEHIND US IN LIKE A CONTINUOUS S LIKE A SNAKE TRAIL IN THE SAND.I PUT THECAR IN GEAR AND SPED AWAY ALL I COULD SAY WAS OH MY GOD OH MY GOD OVER AND OVERABOUT FIFTY TIMES.WHEN WE GOT TO JERRYS HOUSE IT WAS THREE O CLOCK IN THEMORNING.THE STRANGEST THING OF ALL IS THAT MY BROTHER AND MY BEST FRIEND HAVE NOMEMORY OF WHAT HAPPENED AND WHEN I TRIED TO TALK TO THEM ABOUT IT THEY SWEARTHEY DONT REMEMBER IT.I KNOW IT HAPPENED BUT HAVE BEEN TO AFRAID TO TELL ANYONE.I TOLD MY WIFE ABOUT IT THREE YEARS AGO ONLY AFTER SHE TOLD ME SHE SAW AUFO.I NEVER REPORTED IT BECAUSE I DIDNT WANT TO LOOK LIKE I WAS CRAZYAFTER THEINCIDENT I STARTED HAVING DREAMS ABOUT STRANGE THINGS.
